body_html: @davidmascharka I've ran your script in the beginning of this issues in a docker image built from current upstream with the current dockerfile (cuda 8, cudnn 6.0.21, nccl 2.0.5) on 2 GPUs (1 K80 card) and on 8 GPUs (4 K80 cards), and I did not have any hangs.
